title: I Can’t Choose!
detail_text: <:th_ch0005/>Hanamaru-chan! I’m in a pinch, nya~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>What’s wrong, Rin-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Rin has to read and write about five books for reading week... Do you have any book recommendations?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Book recommendations!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Yeah, but... Why are you so surprised?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>I couldn’t possibly narrow it down to five books, zura!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Eh!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>It’s just... so difficult...!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Uhm, well, Rin likes stories about... friendship and stuff like that. What about books with that kind of theme?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Even with that criteria, there are still too many, zura~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
